reviewText: If you watched the first DVD, and wanted more, you will be sure to love this one too!  :-)  After this, be sure to get the 3rd and 4th DVDs too.  The 4th DVD is the hardest one to find though... worth it if you are a fan!  :-)  (best to watch in a marathon session....  hehehehe....
Mao-Chan is an absolutely adorable anime, with a pleasing art style. It's made by the same people who made love hina but it's not a harem anime. Good anime to introduce someone to the world of anime.
